title: ASEAN Economic Integration Deepens with New Digital Trade Framework
introText: ASEAN nations have adopted a comprehensive digital trade framework, harmonizing regulations across the 700-million-person bloc. The agreement positions Southeast Asia as a leader in digital economy governance.

content.content: The Digital Economy Framework Agreement establishes common rules for e-commerce, data flows, digital payments, and AI governance. It reduces regulatory fragmentation that has hindered regional digital businesses.
Companies can now operate across all 10 ASEAN markets under unified digital rules. E-commerce platforms and fintech companies will benefit from reduced compliance costs.
The framework is being studied as a potential model for broader international digital trade agreements. ASEAN's approach balances innovation with consumer protection and data privacy.

summary: ASEAN adopts a digital trade framework, harmonizing regulations across 10 nations and positioning Southeast Asia as a leader in digital economy governance.
